content.question: In the context of the passage as a whole, paragraph 4, sentence 4 (“Our Sunday dinners . . . soul food”) serves primarily to

choices.label: introduce a claim defended throughout the rest of the passage about the significance of soul food
elaborate on a claim made earlier in the passage about the connection between food and regional culture
signal a reevaluation of the author’s position on the merits of the food she ate as a child
highlight the importance of all the members of the author’s immediate family to her personal development

content.answer: elaborate on a claim made earlier in the passage about the connection between food and regional culture

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Describe the line of reasoning and explain whether it supports an argument's overarching thesis.
